mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rnum,n1.* from(select m.mk_no,m.mk_title,m.mk_content,m.mk_date,m.mk_price,m.mk_state,t.mk_file_rename from market m left join mk_thumb t on m.mk_no=t.mk_no left join membership s on m.mk_writer=s.user_no where s.user_id like '%' || #{search} || '%' or m.mk_title like '%' || #{search} || '%')n1 )where rnum between #{startNO} and #{endNo}

select * from( select rownum rnum,n1.* from(select m.mk_no,m.mk_title,m.mk_content,m.mk_date,m.mk_price,m.mk_state,t.mk_file_rename from market m left join mk_thumb t on m.mk_no=t.mk_no left join membership s on m.mk_writer=s.user_no where s.user_id like '%' || #{search} || '%')n1 )where rnum between #{startNO} and #{endNo}
